original_text: in their effort to keep us from speaking to the Gentiles so that they may be saved. In this way they always heap up their sins to the limit. The wrath of God has come upon them at last.
korean_text: 우리가 이방인에게 말하여 구원받게 함을 그들이 금하여 자기 죄를 항상 채우매 노하심이 끝까지 그들에게 임하였느니라

sentences.original_text: in their effort to keep us from speaking to the Gentiles
sentences.korean_translation: 그들이 우리가 이방인에게 말하는 것을 막으려는 노력으로

sentences.original_text: so that they may be saved
In this way they always heap up their sins
sentences.korean_translation: 이렇게 그들은 언제나 그들의 죄를 쌓아 올린다

sentences.original_text: The wrath of God has come upon them
